description:
Reentrancy in Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address) (src/Node.sol#351-374):
	External calls:
	- adjustedAssets = quoter.calculateRedeemPenalty(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight) (src/Node.sol#358-360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- sharesExiting += shares (src/Node.sol#369)
	Node.sharesExiting (src/Node.sol#56) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Node._finalizeRedemption(address,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/Node.sol#590-609)
	- Node.getSharesExiting() (src/Node.sol#538-540)
	- Node.sharesExiting (src/Node.sol#56)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address)](src/Node.sol#L351-L374):
	External calls:
	- [adjustedAssets = quoter.calculateRedeemPenalty(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight)](src/Node.sol#L358-L360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [sharesExiting += shares](src/Node.sol#L369)
	[Node.sharesExiting](src/Node.sol#L56) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Node._finalizeRedemption(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/Node.sol#L590-L609)
	- [Node.getSharesExiting()](src/Node.sol#L538-L540)
	- [Node.sharesExiting](src/Node.sol#L56)

description:
Reentrancy in Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address) (src/Node.sol#351-374):
	External calls:
	- adjustedAssets = quoter.calculateRedeemPenalty(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight) (src/Node.sol#358-360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- request.pendingRedeemRequest = request.pendingRedeemRequest + shares (src/Node.sol#367)
	- request.sharesAdjusted = request.sharesAdjusted + adjustedShares (src/Node.sol#368)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address)](src/Node.sol#L351-L374):
	External calls:
	- [adjustedAssets = quoter.calculateRedeemPenalty(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight)](src/Node.sol#L358-L360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [request.pendingRedeemRequest = request.pendingRedeemRequest + shares](src/Node.sol#L367)
	- [request.sharesAdjusted = request.sharesAdjusted + adjustedShares](src/Node.sol#L368)

	- adjustedAssets = quoter.getAdjustedAssets(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight,swingPricingEnabled) (src/Node.sol#359-361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- request.pendingRedeemRequest = request.pendingRedeemRequest + shares (src/Node.sol#366)
	- request.sharesAdjusted = request.sharesAdjusted + sharesToBurn (src/Node.sol#367)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address)](src/Node.sol#L355-L373):
	External calls:
	- [adjustedAssets = quoter.getAdjustedAssets(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight,swingPricingEnabled)](src/Node.sol#L359-L361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [request.pendingRedeemRequest = request.pendingRedeemRequest + shares](src/Node.sol#L366)
	- [request.sharesAdjusted = request.sharesAdjusted + sharesToBurn](src/Node.sol#L367)

description:
Version constraint >=0.5.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage.
It is used by:
	- >=0.5.0 (src/interfaces/IERC7540.sol#2)
	- >=0.5.0 (src/interfaces/IERC7575.sol#2)
markdown:
Version constraint >=0.5.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)

	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage.
It is used by:

description:
Reentrancy in Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address) (src/Node.sol#354-372):
	External calls:
	- adjustedAssets = quoter.getAdjustedAssets(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight,swingPricingEnabled) (src/Node.sol#358-360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- sharesExiting += shares (src/Node.sol#367)
	Node.sharesExiting (src/Node.sol#59) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Node._finalizeRedemption(address,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/Node.sol#586-605)
	- Node.getSharesExiting() (src/Node.sol#536-538)
	- Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address) (src/Node.sol#354-372)
	- Node.sharesExiting (src/Node.sol#59)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address)](src/Node.sol#L354-L372):
	External calls:
	- [adjustedAssets = quoter.getAdjustedAssets(asset,sharesExiting,shares,maxSwingFactor,reserveAllocation.targetWeight,swingPricingEnabled)](src/Node.sol#L358-L360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [sharesExiting += shares](src/Node.sol#L367)
	[Node.sharesExiting](src/Node.sol#L59) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Node._finalizeRedemption(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/Node.sol#L586-L605)
	- [Node.getSharesExiting()](src/Node.sol#L536-L538)
	- [Node.requestRedeem(uint256,address,address)](src/Node.sol#L354-L372)
	- [Node.sharesExiting](src/Node.sol#L59)
